means: 碎屑（尤指面包屑或糕饼屑）
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 克拉姆 Crome的变体
[电影]漫画大师罗伯特·克鲁伯

sentence.Network_en: She flicked a crumb off the corner of her mouth.
At last Andrew gave them a crumb of information.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后，安德鲁向他们透露了一点信息。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... cabbage n. 卷心菜 crumb n. 面包屑；糕饼屑 carpet n. 地毯.

常见西餐英语 - 天狼2008 ... 面包屑 bread crumbs;crumbs 面包渣儿 bread crumbs;crumbs 新烤的面包 freshly baked bread.

phrase.cizu_name: crumbs from someone's( 或 a rich man's)table

jx.jx_en_mean: an unfair and inadequate or unsatisfactory share of something
jx.jx_cn_mean: （富人）桌上的碎屑；不公平（或不满意）的所得

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English cruma, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch kruim and German Krume. The final -b was added in the 16th cent., perhaps from crumble but also influenced by words such as dumb, where the original final -b is retained although no longer pronounced

entry.tran: 食物碎屑;面包屑;糕饼屑
entry.def: Crumbs are tiny pieces that fall from bread, biscuits, or cake when you cut it or eat it.

example.ex: I stood up, brushing crumbs from my  trousers.
example.tran: 我站起来，掸掉裤子上的碎屑。

entry.def: A crumb of something, for example information, is a very small amount of it.

example.ex: At last Andrew gave them a crumb of information...
example.tran: 最后，安德鲁向他们透露了一点信息。

example.ex: The government were able to draw a few crumbs of comfort from today's unemployment figures.
example.tran: 政府能够从现在的失业人数中得到些许安慰。

means.word_mean: 1. a very small quantity of something;

sentences.sentence: "he gave only a crumb of information about his plans"
"there were few crumbs of comfort in the report"

means.word_mean: 2. a person who is deemed to be despicable or contemptible;

sentences.sentence: "the British call a contemptible person a `git'"

means.word_mean: 3. small piece of e.g. bread or cake

list.explanation: (无业游民用语) 布满虱子的、破旧的廉价客店

example.en: I went into the crumb joint and was shocked.
example.zh: 我走进那廉价的小客栈，大吃了一惊。

list.explanation: [无业游民用语]铺盖卷，背包，床铺

example.en: The hobo left the fleabag with his crumb-roll next day.
example.zh: 第二天，那流动工人带着他的铺盖卷离开了那廉价寄宿所。

auth_sentence.content: There is a crumb of comfort, too, for gardeners.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is a crumb of comfort, too, for gardeners.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is a crumb of comfort, too, for gardeners.

auth_sentence.content: You'll be licking up every last crumb on your plate.
auth_sentence.res_content: You'll be licking up every last crumb on your plate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You'll be licking up every last crumb on your plate.

auth_sentence.content: He brings me food, but I have touched not one crumb.
auth_sentence.res_content: He brings me food, but I have touched not one crumb.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He brings me food, but I have touched not one crumb.

means.word_mean: 碎屑(尤指面包屑或糕饼屑)

jushi.english: Don't leave any crumbs on the table when you have your breakfast.
jushi.chinese: 吃早餐时不要在桌子上留下面包屑。
